scripts.text:
PRINT 'start of the statement'
select * from iplteams
PRINT 'Endof the statement'
create table scripttable(tablename varchar(20), tabletype varchar(10))
select * from iplteams where name=@Playername AND team=@Team

INSERT INTO dwh_core.comm_pims_rw_sales_lp
    SELECT 
        a.*
    FROM 
        replica_northmpims.rw_sales_vw a
    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
        dwh_core.comm_pims_rw_nodes_lp b
    ON 
        a.SolutionID = b.SolutionID
        AND a.NodeID = b.NodeID
    WHERE 
        a.PeriodTag <> '.'
        AND a.StreamTag != 'LOS'
    ORDER BY 
        a.SolutionID,
        a.CaseID,
        a.NodeID,
        a.PeriodID,
        a.StreamReportOrder;

source.sqlReaderQuery: select refreshed as status from mastertable where tableName= 'salesitems'
